titleStmt.title: A brief account of what pass'd at the Common Council held in London on Fryday the 13th day of May, 1681
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.

notesStmt.note: Item at reel 793:30 identified as Wing L2882 (number cancelled).
Reproduction of originals in the Huntington Library and the Guildhall, London.
